flawed_nl_solution:
June had 76 stickers and was given 25 from her grandparents so she had 76 + 25 = <<76+25=101>>101 stickers
Bonnie had 63 stickers and was given 25 from her grandparents so she had 63 + 25 = <<63+25=88>>88 stickers
June had 101 stickers and Bonnie had 88 stickers so together, they had 101 + 88 = <<101+88=192>>192 stickers
#### 192

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 189, not 192. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
